TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit HostingEnvironment extends System.MarshalByRefObject
Public NotInheritable Class HostingEnvironment Inherits MarshalByRefObject
public ref class HostingEnvironment sealed : MarshalByRefObject

summary.span: 在托管应用程序的应用程序域内向托管应用程序提供应用程序管理功能和应用程序服务。

span.span: Provides application-management functions and application services to a managed application within its application domain.

summary.span: 此类不能被继承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每个托管应用程序域包含的静态实例类，该类提供对应用程序管理功能和应用程序服务的访问。Each managed application domain contains a static instance of the class, which provides access to application-management functions and application services. ## Examples 下面的代码示例是一个网页，显示可从应用程序信息对象。The following code example is a webpage that displays the application information available from the object. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.Hosting.HostingEnvironment#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Hosting.HostingEnvironment/CS/hostingEnvironmentcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.Hosting.HostingEnvironment#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Hosting.HostingEnvironment/VB/hostingEnvironmentvb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 构造函数初始化对象。The constructor initializes the object. 构造函数只调用一次由应用程序的对象。The constructor is called only once by the application's object. 调用构造函数不是一次将导致更多引发异常。Calling the constructor more than once will cause an exception to be thrown.

span.span: The constructor is called more than once.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig void DecrementBusyCount() cil managed

summary.span: 将宿主环境中繁忙对象的计数减一。

span.span: Reduces the count of busy objects in the hosted environment by one.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当一个繁忙的已注册的对象完成其工作后时，它将调用方法用信号通知对象完成处理并减少一个繁忙对象的计数。When a busy registered object finishes its work, it calls the method to signal the object that it has completed processing and to reduce the count of busy objects by one. 忙碌计数大于零，如果宿主应用程序将不会超时，即使没有任何挂起的请求。If the busy count is greater than zero, the hosting application will not time out even if there are no pending requests. 必须调用每次调用的方法方法。There must be a call to the method for each call to the method.

summary.span: 通过阻止创建租约给予 对象无限的生存期。

span.span: Gives the object an infinite lifetime by preventing a lease from being created.
Always .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法重写中其基本类的方法。This method overrides the method in its base class. 它始终返回`null`，防止创建租约，可能会限制对象的生存期。It always returns `null` and prevents a lease from being created that would limit the object's lifetime.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig void InitiateShutdown() cil managed

summary.span: 开始关闭与此宿主关联的 Web 应用程序，并从系统中移除注册对象。

span.span: Starts shutting down the web application associated with this host and removes registered objects from the system.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法来停止 web 应用程序域并删除任何对象注册方法。Use the method to stop a web application domain and remove any objects registered with the method. 完成关闭之前，此方法将立即返回。This method returns immediately, before the shutdown is complete. 传递的参数设置为在每个已注册的对象上调用方法`false`以允许每个已注册的对象以异步方式关闭。The method is called on each registered object with the passed parameter set to `false` to allow each registered object to shut down asynchronously. 在指定时间的等待之后`shutdownTimeout`配置元素的属性方法再次调用传递的参数设置为`true`为剩余的每个已注册对象。After waiting for the amount of time specified in the `shutdownTimeout` attribute of the configuration element, the method is called again with the passed parameter set to `true` for each registered object remaining. 所有已注册的对象完成后关闭，对象关闭应用程序域。Once all registered objects have finished shutting down, the objects shuts down the application domain.

summary.span: 计划可以在后台运行（与任何请求无关）的任务。

span.span: Schedules a task which can run in the background, independent of any request.

summary.span: 重载方法不会将 或 从调用方流入被调用方。

span.span: This overloaded method doesn’t flow the or from the caller to the callee.

summary.span: 因此，这些对象的成员（例如 属性）将不会从调用方流入被调用方。

span.span: Therefore, members of those objects, such as the property, will not flow from the caller to the callee.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig void QueueBackgroundWorkItem(class System.Action`1<valuetype System.Threading.CancellationToken> workItem) cil managed
Public Shared Sub QueueBackgroundWorkItem (workItem As Action(Of CancellationToken))

span.span: A unit of execution.

summary.span: [仅在 .NET Framework 4.5.2 及更高版本中受支持]

span.span: [Supported in the .NET Framework 4.5.2 and later versions]

summary.span: 计划可以在后台运行（与任何请求无关）的任务。

span.span: Schedules a task which can run in the background, independent of any request.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不同于普通的线程池工作项，ASP.NET 可以跟踪的多少工作项通过此 API 注册当前正在运行，并且 ASP.NET 运行时将尝试对延迟关闭这些工作项，直到执行完的 AppDomain。Differs from a normal ThreadPool work item in that ASP.NET can keep track of how many work items registered through this API are currently running, and the ASP.NET runtime will try to delay AppDomain shutdown until these work items have finished executing. ASP.NET 托管应用程序域之外，不能调用此 API。This API cannot be called outside of an ASP.NET-managed AppDomain. 当应用程序关闭时，将终止提供的 CancellationToken。The provided CancellationToken will be signaled when the application is shutting down. 采用返回任务的回调;工作项将被视为完成回调返回时。 takes a Task-returning callback; the work item will be considered finished when the callback returns.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig void QueueBackgroundWorkItem(class System.Func`2<valuetype System.Threading.CancellationToken, class System.Threading.Tasks.Task> workItem) cil managed
Public Shared Sub QueueBackgroundWorkItem (workItem As Func(Of CancellationToken, Task))
static member QueueBackgroundWorkItem : Func<System.Threading.CancellationToken, System.Threading.Tasks.Task> -> unit

span.span: A unit of execution.

summary.span: [仅在 .NET Framework 4.5.2 及更高版本中受支持]

span.span: [Supported in the .NET Framework 4.5.2 and later versions]

summary.span: 计划可以在后台运行（与任何请求无关）的任务。

span.span: Schedules a task which can run in the background, independent of any request.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不同于普通的线程池工作项，ASP.NET 可以跟踪的多少工作项通过此 API 注册当前正在运行，并且 ASP.NET 运行时将尝试对延迟关闭这些工作项，直到执行完的 AppDomain。Differs from a normal ThreadPool work item in that ASP.NET can keep track of how many work items registered through this API are currently running, and the ASP.NET runtime will try to delay AppDomain shutdown until these work items have finished executing. ASP.NET 托管应用程序域之外，不能调用此 API。This API cannot be called outside of an ASP.NET-managed AppDomain. 当应用程序关闭时，将终止提供的 CancellationToken。The provided CancellationToken will be signaled when the application is shutting down. 采用返回任务的回调;工作项将被视为已完成时返回的任务转换为终止状态。 takes a Task-returning callback; the work item will be considered finished when the returned Task transitions to a terminal state.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig void RegisterObject(class System.Web.Hosting.IRegisteredObject obj) cil managed
Public Shared Sub RegisterObject (obj As IRegisteredObject)

span.span: The object to register.

summary.span: 将一个对象放在应用程序的已注册对象列表中。

span.span: Places an object in the list of registered objects for the application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类使当前的应用程序域，以创建、 管理和销毁对象在当前应用程序域之外的方法。The class enables methods outside the current application domain to create, manage, and destroy objects inside the current application domain. 方法用于向宿主环境注册前面创建的对象。The method is used to register previously created objects with the hosting environment. 对象注册方法必须实现接口。Objects registered with the method must implement the interface. 若要使用已注册的对象，请执行以下步骤：To use a registered object, follow these steps: 1. 通过调用创建已注册对象的新实例方法。Create a new instance of your registered object by calling the method. 2. 调用特定于类型的方法来初始化新对象。Call a type-specific method to initialize your new object. 在初始化方法中，调用方法将对象添加到已注册的对象的列表。In the initialization method, call the method to add the object to the list of registered objects. 3. 调用方法返回时所需的已注册的对象。Call the method to return the registered object when required. 4. 当你想要停止您的对象时，调用方法。When you wish to stop your object, call the method. 方法又调用方法。The method in turn calls the method. 5. 在中方法，让对象调用方法。In the method, have your object call the method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例是的实现`Start`已注册对象的方法。The following code example is an implementation of a `Start` method for a registered object. 运行该示例所需的完整代码，请参阅示例部分接口概述主题。For the full code required to run the example, see the Example section of the interface overview topic. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Hosting.ApplicationManager#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Hosting.ApplicationManager/CS/appManagercs.aspx.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Hosting.ApplicationManager#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Hosting.ApplicationManager/VB/appManagervb.aspx.vb#2)]

span.span: Registers a new instance with the ASP.NET compilation system.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法将添加指定的虚拟路径提供程序实例与应用程序的列表。The method adds the specified instance to the application's list of virtual-path providers. 有关详细信息，请参阅类概述。For more information, see the class overview. ## Examples 下面的代码示例是注册一个自定义应用程序启动方法的一部分编译系统使用的实例。The following code example is part of an application startup method that registers a custom instance with the compilation system. 运行该示例所需的完整代码，请参阅示例部分类概述主题。For the full code required to run the example, see the Example section of the class overview topic. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Hosting.VirtualPathProvider#11](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/system.web.hosting.virtualpathprovider/CS/AppStart.cs#11)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Hosting.VirtualPathProvider#11](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/system.web.hosting.virtualpathprovider/VB/AppStart.vb#11)]

summary.span: 设置当前线程的区域性信息。

span.span: Sets culture information for the current thread.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig class System.IDisposable SetCultures() cil managed
Public Shared Function SetCultures () As IDisposable

summary.span: 将当前线程的区域性设置为应用程序配置文件中指定的区域性。

span.span: Sets the current thread to the culture specified in the application configuration file.

returns.span: 一个表示更改前的区域性的 对象；可使用此对象恢复到先前的区域性。

span.span: An object that represents the culture prior to changing; this object can be used to revert to the previous culture.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法将当前线程设置为在指定的区域性[全球化元素 （ASP.NET 设置架构）](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e2dffc8e-ebd2-439b-a2fd-e3ac5e620da7)应用程序的配置文件中的元素。The method sets the current thread to the culture specified in the [globalization Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e2dffc8e-ebd2-439b-a2fd-e3ac5e620da7) element in the application's configuration file.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig class System.IDisposable SetCultures(string virtualPath) cil managed
Public Shared Function SetCultures (virtualPath As String) As IDisposable

param.name: virtualPath
param.span: 包含区域性信息的路径。

span.span: The path that contains the culture information.

summary.span: 将当前线程的区域性设置为指定虚拟路径的区域性。

span.span: Sets the current thread to the culture of the specified virtual path.

returns.span: 一个表示更改前的区域性的 对象；可使用此对象恢复到先前的区域性。

span.span: An object that represents the culture prior to changing; this object can be used to revert to the previous culture.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法将当前线程设置为结果应用会影响指定的虚拟路径的配置文件中的所有元素后的区域性。The method sets the current thread to the culture that results after applying all elements in the configuration files affecting the specified virtual path.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property ShutdownReason As ApplicationShutdownReason
public: static property System::Web::ApplicationShutdownReason ShutdownReason { System::Web::ApplicationShutdownReason get(); };

summary.span: 返回指示应用程序终止原因的枚举值。

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared Event StopListening As EventHandler

summary.span: [仅在 .NET Framework 4.5.1 中受支持]

span.span: [Supported in the .NET Framework 4.5.1 only]

summary.span: 当辅助进程或与该主机相关联的应用程序池已停止侦听新的请求，并将最终关闭时才发生。

span.span: Occurs when the worker process or application pool associated with this host has stopped listening for new requests and will eventually shut down.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 应用程序池和其关联的工作进程正在关闭时由 IIS，例如当应用程序池已达到计划的更新间隔，IIS 通知应用程序关闭 ASP.NET 运行时并的工作进程应用程序池停止侦听新的请求。When an application pool and its associated worker processes are being shut down by IIS, for example when an application pool has reached a scheduled recycle interval, IIS notifies the ASP.NET runtime that the application is shutting down and the worker process for the application pool stops listening for new requests. 应用程序使用长时间运行的请求，例如[SignalR](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=285432)应用程序，可以侦听事件和 IIS 已启动的应用程序关闭时正常关闭其长时间运行的操作池和其关联的工作进程。Applications that use long-running requests, for example [SignalR](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=285432) applications, can listen for the event and gracefully shut down their long-running operations when IIS has initiated the shutdown of an application pool and its associated worker processes. > [!WARNING] > 有几个在实现时，开发人员必须考虑的设计注意事项事件：There are several design considerations that a developer must consider when implementing the event: > > 1. 事件功能仅适用于配置为使用 IIS 集成的管道的应用程序。The event is only available for applications that are configured to use the IIS integrated pipeline. > 2. 开发人员不会引发错误从其实现; 引发错误将产生不可预知的结果。Developers must not throw errors from their implementations; throwing errors will have unpredictable results. > 3. ASP.NET 中的操作的并发特性，则无法保证，ASP.NET 将会调用事件后已实现由开发人员。Due to the concurrent nature of operations within ASP.NET, there is no guarantee that ASP.NET will call a event once it has been implemented by a developer. > 4. 事件可以与其他同时执行通知。The event can execute concurrently with other notifications. > 5. 开发人员需要了解 ASP.NET 可能关闭应用程序域时其事件执行和设计其实现来处理这种可能性。Developers need to be aware that ASP.NET may shut down the application domain while their event is executing and design their implementations to handle that possibility. > 6. 不能阻止事件处理程序;阻止实现会导致死锁，并且达到快速失败保护时间间隔后，IIS 将终止工作进程。 event handlers must not block; blocking implementations will result in deadlocks, and IIS will terminate the worker process when the rapid fail protection interval is reached.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig void UnregisterObject(class System.Web.Hosting.IRegisteredObject obj) cil managed
Public Shared Sub UnregisterObject (obj As IRegisteredObject)

span.span: The object to remove.

summary.span: 从应用程序的已注册对象列表中移除一个对象。

span.span: Removes an object from the list of registered objects for the application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类使当前的应用程序域，以创建、 管理和销毁对象在当前应用程序域之外的方法。The class enables methods outside the current application domain to create, manage, and destroy objects inside the current application domain. 方法用于从宿主环境中删除以前已注册的对象。The method is used to remove previously registered objects from the hosting environment. ## Examples 下面的代码示例是已注册对象的方法。The following code example is the method for a registered object. 运行该示例所需的完整代码，请参阅示例部分接口概述主题。For the full code required to run the example, see the Example section of the interface overview topic. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Hosting.ApplicationManager#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Hosting.ApplicationManager/CS/appManagercs.aspx.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Hosting.ApplicationManager#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Hosting.ApplicationManager/VB/appManagervb.aspx.vb#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property VirtualPathProvider As VirtualPathProvider
public: static property System::Web::Hosting::VirtualPathProvider ^ VirtualPathProvider { System::Web::Hosting::VirtualPathProvider ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取此应用程序的虚拟路径提供程序。

span.span: Gets the virtual path provider for this application.

value.span: 此应用程序的 实例。

span.span: The instance for this application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当多个已注册实例，对象管理的调用链。When more than one instance is registered, the object manages the call chain. 你无法控制虚拟路径提供程序的调用的顺序。You cannot control the order in which virtual path providers are called.
